biography.title: Biography
biography.p1: Born in Bursa in 1980. He graduated from Selçuk University State Conservatory, Department of Acting in 2005.
biography.p2: He started his career at Bursa State Theater and was deemed worthy of the Direklerarası Lions Kerem Yılmazer Young Talent Award for his performance in 'A Very Original Play'.
biography.p3: He continues his work as a director, actor, and producer in international projects based in Switzerland and the Netherlands. He signs global projects with his own production company, Time Right Production.

production.title: Education & Production
production.subtitle: Time Right Production
production.globalExperienceText: Educational and production activities carried out under the umbrella of Time Right Production extend beyond Turkey to Europe. As an actor, director, and executive producer, Zafer Altun has signed off on major organizations, including a 30-day 'Pir Sultan Abdal' tour across 5 different countries, primarily Switzerland (Zurich), Germany (Berlin), and the Netherlands. These global works encompass international production duties such as the 'Eny Finance' Commercial Series and the Simtronik Documentary Film, as well as acting workshops provided under the Maya Kult Verein (Zurich).
